mapper.select: SELECT rm.*, brd.* FROM rooms rm INNER JOIN boards brd ON brd.board_id = rm.room_board INNER JOIN user_rank_room urr ON urr.room_id = rm.room_id INNER JOIN users usr ON usr.usr_id = urr.user_id WHERE usr.usr_id = #{user_id};

SELECT rm.*, brd.*, usr.*, rnks.* FROM rooms rm INNER JOIN user_rank_room urr ON urr.room_id = rm.room_id
INNER JOIN users usr ON usr.usr_id = urr.user_id INNER JOIN ranks rnks ON rnks.rank_id = urr.rank_id
INNER JOIN boards brd ON brd.board_id = rm.room_board
WHERE rm.room_id IN ( SELECT rm.room_id FROM rooms rm INNER JOIN user_rank_room urr ON urr.room_id = rm.room_id INNER JOIN users usr ON usr.usr_id = urr.user_id INNER JOIN ranks rnks ON rnks.rank_id = urr.rank_id WHERE usr.usr_id = #{user_id} AND rm.room_id = #{room_id} GROUP BY rm.room_id )
